alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Livingston (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 10:51AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Livingston and northern Allegany Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1050 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belfast, or 17 miles north of Wellsville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dansville, Belfast, Houghton, Caneadea, Nunda, Angelica, Ossian, Canaseraga, Birdsall, Short Tract, Ossian Center, Swain, Hunt, Rossburg and Dalton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 4 and 5. Interstate 86 between exits 30 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
